Redux Docs

# 

<span key="f0a33736c9f84ba99fbc9c998444c5c7"><span offset-key="f0a33736c9f84ba99fbc9c998444c5c7:0">Installation</span></span>

## 

<span key="e8051c27e5e742eeade41b3ff9b4c965"><span offset-key="e8051c27e5e742eeade41b3ff9b4c965:0">Redux Toolkit</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/installation#redux-toolkit" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="918f6787c0ea49788d8b6d63ddd408bb" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="14c71d8dafdb48beafc3297b0f78bb0a"><span data-offset-key="14c71d8dafdb48beafc3297b0f78bb0a:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="bc64b56f03b9436692bbbc84af8ce330"><span offset-key="bc64b56f03b9436692bbbc84af8ce330:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="9c180ab70f834fb18b3d5b5c3068ee01"><span offset-key="9c180ab70f834fb18b3d5b5c3068ee01:0">Redux Toolkit includes the Redux core, as well as other key packages we feel are essential for building Redux applications (such as Redux Thunk and Reselect).</span></span>

<span key="4238648580914e0c9b2e1f916b92ddc5"><span offset-key="4238648580914e0c9b2e1f916b92ddc5:0">It's available as a package on NPM for use with a module bundler or in a Node application:</span></span>

1

<span key="7298f2398e754705afe07e637b311021"><span offset-key="7298f2398e754705afe07e637b311021:0"># NPMnpm install @reduxjs/toolkit</span></span>

2

<span key="0f6931b72e304e1ba31cddd6c4d08fdd"><span offset-key="0f6931b72e304e1ba31cddd6c4d08fdd:0"># Yarnyarn add @reduxjs/toolkit</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7" />

Copied!

<span key="603755d24ab1445eb5ee05add7b89759"><span offset-key="603755d24ab1445eb5ee05add7b89759:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="123a3572bf1b4546b1ad0303db0d6226"><span offset-key="123a3572bf1b4546b1ad0303db0d6226:0">It's also available as a UMD build, which can be loaded from </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/@reduxjs/toolkit/dist/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6b4564d49fce413eb5081b6eb7dc8b96" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="2f847e74bf6f441b90e94a7e78a9c8a1"><span data-offset-key="2f847e74bf6f441b90e94a7e78a9c8a1:0">the </span><code class="r-1vckr1u r-z2wwpe r-uibjmv r-m2pi6t r-1hvjb8t" data-slate-leaf="true" data-offset-key="2f847e74bf6f441b90e94a7e78a9c8a1:1">dist</code><span data-offset-key="2f847e74bf6f441b90e94a7e78a9c8a1:2"> folder on unpkg</span></span></span></a><span key="72d47ace297249cf84c81282e18e165c"><span offset-key="72d47ace297249cf84c81282e18e165c:0">. The UMD builds make Redux Toolkit available as a </span>`window.RTK`<span offset-key="72d47ace297249cf84c81282e18e165c:2"> global variable.</span></span>

## 

<span key="6c95100088e647bda0ce4bdf19081e45"><span offset-key="6c95100088e647bda0ce4bdf19081e45:0">Redux Core</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/installation#redux-core" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8529a78b15354894a19ae0525a0ad3ee" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="bb82b614ef054bacbd19bf03e8235a64"><span data-offset-key="bb82b614ef054bacbd19bf03e8235a64:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="4853f3ae0ccd4c35abf1bd4c5153cbe2"><span offset-key="4853f3ae0ccd4c35abf1bd4c5153cbe2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="7331d54fc4a5432197d49e350179a870"><span offset-key="7331d54fc4a5432197d49e350179a870:0">To install the stable version:</span></span>

1

<span key="411f7671c1814b2383ec861c1a5018fa"><span offset-key="411f7671c1814b2383ec861c1a5018fa:0"># NPMnpm install redux</span></span>

2

<span key="6170aebd28c04367b8dc3ead4cc70739"><span offset-key="6170aebd28c04367b8dc3ead4cc70739:0"># Yarnyarn add redux</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="c335f7e8e3ca40dc84156b382c984e9f"><span offset-key="c335f7e8e3ca40dc84156b382c984e9f:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="892743cf64da49079f3973d2c48e517d"><span offset-key="892743cf64da49079f3973d2c48e517d:0">If you're not, you can </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/redux/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7468e417108941e7a3da71cebd46122f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="c27885d2700544b19ec1c2fa40692ece"><span data-offset-key="c27885d2700544b19ec1c2fa40692ece:0">access these files on unpkg</span></span></span></a><span key="0a68cf31ac69446a921929ac0f2ccc9c"><span offset-key="0a68cf31ac69446a921929ac0f2ccc9c:0">, download them, or point your package manager to them.</span></span>

<span key="4cca2195888c4605ba7ba1c7ff04b189"><span offset-key="4cca2195888c4605ba7ba1c7ff04b189:0">Most commonly, people consume Redux as a collection of </span></span><a href="http://www.commonjs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8b8300085f1443739d8413769bd3ec80" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="2878eb1daa0e4db0b769d936779185e6"><span data-offset-key="2878eb1daa0e4db0b769d936779185e6:0">CommonJS</span></span></span></a><span key="191d7427a8204826a819baa32252a3a1"><span offset-key="191d7427a8204826a819baa32252a3a1:0"> modules. These modules are what you get when you import </span>`redux`<span offset-key="191d7427a8204826a819baa32252a3a1:2"> in a </span></span><a href="https://webpack.js.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a0360bb06f504006b2a7a075ca81d0a9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="62a57dfdbde9450190bf8beb198dfa0a"><span data-offset-key="62a57dfdbde9450190bf8beb198dfa0a:0">Webpack</span></span></span></a><span key="a53c7d7e54b7423a87e47850e469d5b8"><span offset-key="a53c7d7e54b7423a87e47850e469d5b8:0">, </span></span><a href="http://browserify.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f17f1718f9274369b61ac1bae7ff01c9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="9d57e1c20d9840ee9bdb012a0b313c91"><span data-offset-key="9d57e1c20d9840ee9bdb012a0b313c91:0">Browserify</span></span></span></a><span key="adca012af7a94acda4e83bdd12b5291d"><span offset-key="adca012af7a94acda4e83bdd12b5291d:0">, or a Node environment. If you like to live on the edge and use </span></span><a href="https://rollupjs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a7c03c0406414d44a154075163126269" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="8fe6f39d5edd4918a7e22f844583b551"><span data-offset-key="8fe6f39d5edd4918a7e22f844583b551:0">Rollup</span></span></span></a><span key="aad6c3224dc3420ab140fcf58d83cfb7"><span offset-key="aad6c3224dc3420ab140fcf58d83cfb7:0">, we support that as well.</span></span>

<span key="1874bffe6cde4e4281c0550a2c1bd0d3"><span offset-key="1874bffe6cde4e4281c0550a2c1bd0d3:0">If you don't use a module bundler, it's also fine. The </span>`redux`<span offset-key="1874bffe6cde4e4281c0550a2c1bd0d3:2"> npm package includes precompiled production and development </span></span><a href="https://github.com/umdjs/umd" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1de6a13f508346e6a8d32a7ec1d085f5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="ec35f913011c4452a0bd153c216646e7"><span data-offset-key="ec35f913011c4452a0bd153c216646e7:0">UMD</span></span></span></a><span key="4bd1c17aa358438baf4d59cf41d73c15"><span offset-key="4bd1c17aa358438baf4d59cf41d73c15:0"> builds in the </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/redux/dist/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7cb5fcda701141a2b0748a52933b856e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="a4e9121dac104d9fa116a0c8523c2ad3"><code class="r-1vckr1u r-z2wwpe r-uibjmv r-m2pi6t r-1hvjb8t" data-slate-leaf="true" data-offset-key="a4e9121dac104d9fa116a0c8523c2ad3:0">dist</code><span data-offset-key="a4e9121dac104d9fa116a0c8523c2ad3:1"> folder</span></span></span></a><span key="d9578a0da2b24a0a9bd953fad767f8da"><span offset-key="d9578a0da2b24a0a9bd953fad767f8da:0">. They can be used directly without a bundler and are thus compatible with many popular JavaScript module loaders and environments. For example, you can drop a UMD build as a </span></span><a href="https://unpkg.com/redux/dist/redux.js" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1692b601953840c8a09dec6303e80069" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="47983d419f0e4b8a8ef5b658188f5757"><code class="r-1vckr1u r-z2wwpe r-uibjmv r-m2pi6t r-1hvjb8t" data-slate-leaf="true" data-offset-key="47983d419f0e4b8a8ef5b658188f5757:0">&lt;script&gt;</code><span data-offset-key="47983d419f0e4b8a8ef5b658188f5757:1"> tag</span></span></span></a><span key="5136ecf937f641c49483fb3818a2b127"><span offset-key="5136ecf937f641c49483fb3818a2b127:0"> on the page, or </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/redux/pull/1181#issuecomment-167361975" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="456dfc533d524bdba248d93a4e6ac4b4" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="2588d983935f4a809905849fcd0fcb11"><span data-offset-key="2588d983935f4a809905849fcd0fcb11:0">tell Bower to install it</span></span></span></a><span key="59a7c02498814571bdf4e21509986d18"><span offset-key="59a7c02498814571bdf4e21509986d18:0">. The UMD builds make Redux available as a </span>`window.Redux`<span offset-key="59a7c02498814571bdf4e21509986d18:2"> global variable.</span></span>

<span key="de07937e003b4af186d3b4ba21afdc3c"><span offset-key="de07937e003b4af186d3b4ba21afdc3c:0">The Redux source code is written in ES2015 but we precompile both CommonJS and UMD builds to ES5 so they work in </span></span><a href="https://caniuse.com/#feat=es5" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b092645b42a646918180b904e960ab75" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="5d9198fb78314786a837ee567826f808"><span data-offset-key="5d9198fb78314786a837ee567826f808:0">any modern browser</span></span></span></a><span key="c7cf3163ff874206926074c77aefde37"><span offset-key="c7cf3163ff874206926074c77aefde37:0">. You don't need to use Babel or a module bundler to </span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/examples#counter-vanilla" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7f4b528471534baf9f12eac083080bc7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="4b0941d13cd74258b6ba8084e88fc46d"><span data-offset-key="4b0941d13cd74258b6ba8084e88fc46d:0">get started with Redux</span></span></span></a><span key="a9166dac45da48ebb7fbb786a9d14d60"><span offset-key="a9166dac45da48ebb7fbb786a9d14d60:0">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="09d1b86c23f44729bddb7b0631d4b7b5"><span offset-key="09d1b86c23f44729bddb7b0631d4b7b5:0">Complementary Packages</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/installation#complementary-packages" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6456e0455f154483b4a6052668929d6d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="b11c542fb44f446cb5410d8a76bd9c08"><span data-offset-key="b11c542fb44f446cb5410d8a76bd9c08:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="dca1f41f2336405ea0cd4e2cd3c9c4e2"><span offset-key="dca1f41f2336405ea0cd4e2cd3c9c4e2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="2245b10dfb2a4628a7169cfc8bb33687"><span offset-key="2245b10dfb2a4628a7169cfc8bb33687:0">Most likely, you'll also need </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/react-redux" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a761e02b45ae499da329fd7228e92b25" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="2c06b72985b440fe9cc8d85767cc5a63"><span data-offset-key="2c06b72985b440fe9cc8d85767cc5a63:0">the React bindings</span></span></span></a><span key="40551fd1d5014b4fbbdf6fc3be276647"><span offset-key="40551fd1d5014b4fbbdf6fc3be276647:0"> and </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/redux-devtools" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="40ef2d868bf94764842a87ad27e0c825" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="419d916171df4f04aff9f403e6a0dc9e"><span data-offset-key="419d916171df4f04aff9f403e6a0dc9e:0">the developer tools</span></span></span></a><span key="534c322269564cccb5f900bb39837ecc"><span offset-key="534c322269564cccb5f900bb39837ecc:0">.</span></span>

1

<span key="8c0290ce7b624bc0b6b8e63d0d7d18c6"><span offset-key="8c0290ce7b624bc0b6b8e63d0d7d18c6:0">npm install react-reduxnpm install --save-dev redux-devtools</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="e4539c5dcdda49b5a55810de80b804b9"><span offset-key="e4539c5dcdda49b5a55810de80b804b9:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="0f9e18b5549846a780ce4ae6ddb58a02"><span offset-key="0f9e18b5549846a780ce4ae6ddb58a02:0">Note that unlike Redux itself, many packages in the Redux ecosystem don't provide UMD builds, so we recommend using CommonJS module bundlers like </span></span><a href="https://webpack.js.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="26c47ac2fbb44e1b985e659cc3da3348" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="2dc1c40c759545e683cd89533bcf5b95"><span data-offset-key="2dc1c40c759545e683cd89533bcf5b95:0">Webpack</span></span></span></a><span key="d915b253d749491eb9d95f440560d20b"><span offset-key="d915b253d749491eb9d95f440560d20b:0"> and </span></span><a href="http://browserify.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5ec3468b13544efb917805e345518b43" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="0da7281447ff4e18a19a9db7c8e0c572"><span data-offset-key="0da7281447ff4e18a19a9db7c8e0c572:0">Browserify</span></span></span></a><span key="49c23853b8504dd0b356b31c899e632e"><span offset-key="49c23853b8504dd0b356b31c899e632e:0"> for the most comfortable development experience.</span></span>

## 

<span key="dcd7ba77612a4229a34f4600c64849ce"><span offset-key="dcd7ba77612a4229a34f4600c64849ce:0">Create a React Redux App</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/installation#create-a-react-redux-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="90dc54d591924d3583d57cfc5f495d3f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="7919c3e13fd14d9bbc2d4326905f2d68"><span data-offset-key="7919c3e13fd14d9bbc2d4326905f2d68:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="748268324ab24c929506a3caf9b7d681"><span offset-key="748268324ab24c929506a3caf9b7d681:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="0bfb883dd3e14e3089777dd82906b99c"><span offset-key="0bfb883dd3e14e3089777dd82906b99c:0">The recommended way to start new apps with React and Redux is by using the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/cra-template-redux" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="247fda7c4cda46778b160815a175df0f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="44c0d29860f3437db4e9ab8ca283cd6c"><span data-offset-key="44c0d29860f3437db4e9ab8ca283cd6c:0">official Redux+JS template</span></span></span></a><span key="4f1a5bb8d7d74de0b93e32e2d6cfa066"><span offset-key="4f1a5bb8d7d74de0b93e32e2d6cfa066:0"> or </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/cra-template-redux-typescript" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b376b2cf8efd45f8979225e0e4f361ca" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="54ed305001b743f6b52f727bc0ea28b0"><span data-offset-key="54ed305001b743f6b52f727bc0ea28b0:0">Redux+TS template</span></span></span></a><span key="6330d056d4b247dfb237cb2942bcaa8e"><span offset-key="6330d056d4b247dfb237cb2942bcaa8e:0"> for </span></span><a href="https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5543420a871c469490e0414311194f47" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="efd217ee408f4c1cb6313e2a2b63e84b"><span data-offset-key="efd217ee408f4c1cb6313e2a2b63e84b:0">Create React App</span></span></span></a><span key="fd36a915d05642a3a6726107854b22f7"><span offset-key="fd36a915d05642a3a6726107854b22f7:0">, which takes advantage of </span></span><a href="https://redux-toolkit.js.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6bd5923c1e7444feafec84387621838e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="4281060a7d694dde8b18b3f200505b58"><strong>Redux Toolkit</strong></span></span></a><span key="0f9f332f7ce549059ac854050b34dcfa"><span offset-key="0f9f332f7ce549059ac854050b34dcfa:0"> and React Redux's integration with React components.</span></span>

1

<span key="e7f1bbb8078c475994becd6ceb46e6ec"><span offset-key="e7f1bbb8078c475994becd6ceb46e6ec:0"># Redux + Plain JS templatenpx create-react-app my-app --template redux</span></span>

<span key="b6fc2f0ecda144f28ad230159b48024b"><span offset-key="b6fc2f0ecda144f28ad230159b48024b:0"># Redux + TypeScript templatenpx create-react-app my-app --template redux-typescript</span></span>

# 

<span key="aa41cfec35b348aa88e2b75a89c51a00"><span offset-key="aa41cfec35b348aa88e2b75a89c51a00:0">Core Concepts</span></span>

<span key="06e551a48e2941ada7129410365fbb30"><span offset-key="06e551a48e2941ada7129410365fbb30:0">Imagine your app’s state is described as a plain object. For example, the state of a todo app might look like this:</span></span>

1

<span key="351c6861834b4ccb995eca5db28f95eb"><span offset-key="351c6861834b4ccb995eca5db28f95eb:0">{ todos: \[{ text: 'Eat food', completed: true }, { text: 'Exercise', completed: false }\], visibilityFilter: 'SHOW\_COMPLETED'}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="dc50032d95534900bffebc8ede794418"><span offset-key="dc50032d95534900bffebc8ede794418:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="c03fc477fbbe463380efba3242b05472"><span offset-key="c03fc477fbbe463380efba3242b05472:0">This object is like a “model” except that there are no setters. This is so that different parts of the code can’t change the state arbitrarily, causing hard-to-reproduce bugs.</span></span>

<span key="f5a43bd6e7b14f439fff7eb31f073dec"><span offset-key="f5a43bd6e7b14f439fff7eb31f073dec:0">To change something in the state, you need to dispatch an action. An action is a plain JavaScript object (notice how we don’t introduce any magic?) that describes what happened. Here are a few example actions:</span></span>

1

<span key="95f7ff761241481d9ef87d1d6846e7e3"><span offset-key="95f7ff761241481d9ef87d1d6846e7e3:0">{ type: 'ADD\_TODO', text: 'Go to swimming pool' }{ type: 'TOGGLE\_TODO', index: 1 }{ type: 'SET\_VISIBILITY\_FILTER', filter: 'SHOW\_ALL' }</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="61c6312884384cd7b05c5308fa08b7a0"><span offset-key="61c6312884384cd7b05c5308fa08b7a0:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="4b0ef4b439d14b7b8069596f6b348cde"><span offset-key="4b0ef4b439d14b7b8069596f6b348cde:0">Enforcing that every change is described as an action lets us have a clear understanding of what’s going on in the app. If something changed, we know why it changed. Actions are like breadcrumbs of what has happened. Finally, to tie state and actions together, we write a function called a reducer. Again, nothing magical about it—it’s just a function that takes state and action as arguments, and returns the next state of the app. It would be hard to write such a function for a big app, so we write smaller functions managing parts of the state:</span></span>

1

<span key="b9779b1edf5e43ebbd8ef5bde2847683"><span offset-key="b9779b1edf5e43ebbd8ef5bde2847683:0">function visibilityFilter(state = 'SHOW\_ALL', action) { if (action.type === 'SET\_VISIBILITY\_FILTER') { return action.filter } else { return state }}</span></span>

2

<span key="ab9bdc22baff46f8a2b51f5f97bafec5"><span offset-key="ab9bdc22baff46f8a2b51f5f97bafec5:0">function todos(state = \[\], action) { switch (action.type) { case 'ADD\_TODO': return state.concat(\[{ text: action.text, completed: false }\]) case 'TOGGLE\_TODO': return state.map((todo, index) => action.index === index ? { text: todo.text, completed: !todo.completed } : todo ) default: return state }}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="cbadc5485e584d2c9857840f43af5a00"><span offset-key="cbadc5485e584d2c9857840f43af5a00:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="a87d3b9b89e840ed8c289edd75698137"><span offset-key="a87d3b9b89e840ed8c289edd75698137:0">And we write another reducer that manages the complete state of our app by calling those two reducers for the corresponding state keys:</span></span>

1

<span key="aefeba287ef74c48a3424fbd2b487600"><span offset-key="aefeba287ef74c48a3424fbd2b487600:0">function todoApp(state = {}, action) { return { todos: todos(state.todos, action), visibilityFilter: visibilityFilter(state.visibilityFilter, action) }}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="596772a6f33c4d7db13e4ee8c53aca8b"><span offset-key="596772a6f33c4d7db13e4ee8c53aca8b:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="e447c1a04f5242718df49237f9365f67"><span offset-key="e447c1a04f5242718df49237f9365f67:0">This is basically the whole idea of Redux. Note that we haven’t used any Redux APIs. It comes with a few utilities to facilitate this pattern, but the main idea is that you describe how your state is updated over time in response to action objects, and 90% of the code you write is just plain JavaScript, with no use of Redux itself, its APIs, or any magic.</span></span>

# 

<span key="810f627a13294771af66af015f48e8f0"><span offset-key="810f627a13294771af66af015f48e8f0:0">Ecosystem</span></span>

<span key="0edc23df68714787bd8e298daf80b193"><span offset-key="0edc23df68714787bd8e298daf80b193:0">Redux is a tiny library, but its contracts and APIs are carefully chosen to spawn an ecosystem of tools and extensions, and the community has created a wide variety of helpful addons, libraries, and tools. You don't need to use any of these addons to use Redux, but they can help make it easier to implement features and solve problems in your application.</span></span>

<span key="4c26c536d3b445408071cfcfeced0c1f"><span offset-key="4c26c536d3b445408071cfcfeced0c1f:0">For an extensive catalog of libraries, addons, and tools related to Redux, check out the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/markerikson/redux-ecosystem-links" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0381bf0c06bd419293f2db6d77157a9a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="a96bf0c5ea614481a9f2c56115ccb2e5"><span data-offset-key="a96bf0c5ea614481a9f2c56115ccb2e5:0">Redux Ecosystem Links</span></span></span></a><span key="14dfc953febd4b27baa959e87d0363c8"><span offset-key="14dfc953febd4b27baa959e87d0363c8:0"> list. Also, the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/markerikson/react-redux-links" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d5b7be6094a84365a56eb229357d262e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="bc4e4e4edbf945fba5af85628c93ac31"><span data-offset-key="bc4e4e4edbf945fba5af85628c93ac31:0">React/Redux Links</span></span></span></a><span key="2fe898e626c64834b86a7f3eb79dee11"><span offset-key="2fe898e626c64834b86a7f3eb79dee11:0"> list contains tutorials and other useful resources for anyone learning React or Redux.</span></span>

<span key="dc69e80572b946b1a2e12e261b1c6b00"><span offset-key="dc69e80572b946b1a2e12e261b1c6b00:0">This page lists some of the Redux-related addons that the Redux maintainers have vetted personally, or that have shown widespread adoption in the community. Don't let this discourage you from trying the rest of them! The ecosystem is growing too fast, and we have a limited time to look at everything. Consider these the “staff picks”, and don't hesitate to submit a PR if you've built something wonderful with Redux.</span></span>

<span key="8edd9ec8ce5b47f18e4902d95070de88"><span offset-key="8edd9ec8ce5b47f18e4902d95070de88:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/Workable/redux-test-belt" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1674c1e561284787b8bf05d11c9fb33c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="225c05bbd4514b9bb1c1183a146ae1b4"><strong>Workable/redux-test-belt</strong></span></span></a><span key="8f518267a6d64415851ed5d3a68feabd"><span offset-key="8f518267a6d64415851ed5d3a68feabd:0"> Extends the store API to make it easier assert, isolate, and manipulate the store</span></span>

<span key="66db6f416d024bd684093b1f73dbb681"><span offset-key="66db6f416d024bd684093b1f73dbb681:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/conorhastings/redux-test-recorder" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f57688a1da5d40e69858b37f823dff21" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="c8a923067cb64eb49f275af84c8d1d7d"><strong>conorhastings/redux-test-recorder</strong></span></span></a><span key="946ab66991214445a4190339dfb0f583"><span offset-key="946ab66991214445a4190339dfb0f583:0"> Middleware to automatically generate reducers tests based on actions in the app</span></span>

<span key="b55e287d76a74270b00619c8d386febb"><span offset-key="b55e287d76a74270b00619c8d386febb:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/wix/redux-testkit" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="96356059eef14abc8b71ff57aec27e48" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="556148d95a73457ca0736629769604b4"><strong>wix/redux-testkit</strong></span></span></a><span key="64b5ec89eac04ff2991a8c9d04796f17"><span offset-key="64b5ec89eac04ff2991a8c9d04796f17:0"> Complete and opinionated testkit for testing Redux projects (reducers, selectors, actions, thunks)</span></span>

<span key="5f1cf70f10794cfea53f4ba185410784"><span offset-key="5f1cf70f10794cfea53f4ba185410784:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/jfairbank/redux-saga-test-plan" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e17ba8f384514cd0949bdffb1741ac72" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="15a2b84d830d4725b9141102c9d74339"><strong>jfairbank/redux-saga-test-plan</strong></span></span></a><span key="9dc22c1e34534f99b8d8ecdf0d7b73bb"><span offset-key="9dc22c1e34534f99b8d8ecdf0d7b73bb:0"> Makes integration and unit testing of sagas a breeze</span></span>

## 

<span key="8a475e739e4841639f147a00b73c5515"><span offset-key="8a475e739e4841639f147a00b73c5515:0">Routing</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/ecosystem#routing" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5e35748f50bb4437bf5c3a5b4d08fe28" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="f811e6adde414e8e94020db535cd75e4"><span data-offset-key="f811e6adde414e8e94020db535cd75e4:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="56f6a2706819456ea4e45be420b04275"><span offset-key="56f6a2706819456ea4e45be420b04275:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="febbe8a3fb0a403ba24898cfabee1711"><span offset-key="febbe8a3fb0a403ba24898cfabee1711:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/supasate/connected-react-router" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9c1487cdd29f45f793349522bd3e5257" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="4f1906c402984cb896bbe158d8a50947"><strong>supasate/connected-react-router</strong></span></span></a><span key="85330f88684e47429f88726009b681df"><span offset-key="85330f88684e47429f88726009b681df:0"> Synchronize React Router 4 state with your Redux store.</span></span>

<span key="ab8937636c104e98b1e37b52954d7053"><span offset-key="ab8937636c104e98b1e37b52954d7053:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/faceyspacey/redux-first-router" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1b7fc627345d41cf87b6c3be2ee815b4" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="372ea8e345a64dba82525f463db4efef"><strong>faceyspacey/redux-first-router</strong></span></span></a><span key="e14c4e95d2d3426080a51aea0bb020d0"><span offset-key="e14c4e95d2d3426080a51aea0bb020d0:0"> Seamless Redux-first routing. Think of your app in states, not routes, not components, while keeping the address bar in sync. Everything is state. Connect your components and just dispatch flux standard actions.</span></span>

## 

<span key="ad66546746ab4c81a7024ccc1decb566"><span offset-key="ad66546746ab4c81a7024ccc1decb566:0">Forms</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/ecosystem#forms" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c38fbea313f0475fad082d8f352f591e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="ac112025f1734f73bcd1fe175fc19da8"><span data-offset-key="ac112025f1734f73bcd1fe175fc19da8:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="a9f5e6b96b704681a6db0bcb89d66bea"><span offset-key="a9f5e6b96b704681a6db0bcb89d66bea:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="d7a55e5495104f18b74c4892c639f45c"><span offset-key="d7a55e5495104f18b74c4892c639f45c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/erikras/redux-form" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e706eede87d64d24bb7f4da9c4aa5d32" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="5e559e2fa30a4fdd85e982053f763bcd"><strong>erikras/redux-form</strong></span></span></a><span key="5f950f4474e0405b9a2e13d679132f90"><span offset-key="5f950f4474e0405b9a2e13d679132f90:0"> A full-featured library to enable a React HTML form to store its state in Redux.</span></span>

<span key="e49ef232b0d54f9ca378ea31972c89cf"><span offset-key="e49ef232b0d54f9ca378ea31972c89cf:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/davidkpiano/react-redux-form" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="00a444652146442bb2af631676b37841" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="042182b6ed16499a8aead807d08850ac"><strong>davidkpiano/react-redux-form</strong></span></span></a><span key="4ba49af6a83a463f8e49d4b721ea2ee3"><span offset-key="4ba49af6a83a463f8e49d4b721ea2ee3:0"> React Redux Form is a collection of reducer creators and action creators that make implementing even the most complex and custom forms with React and Redux simple and performant.</span></span>

## 

<span key="090fbe4dea504e99a31d91dec2243a64"><span offset-key="090fbe4dea504e99a31d91dec2243a64:0">Higher-Level Abstractions</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/ecosystem#higher-level-abstractions" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="369f7b0df8c44e39ad6fd784bb862479" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="f7f2a969dd1c483b953235f929d59e6b"><span data-offset-key="f7f2a969dd1c483b953235f929d59e6b:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="71be48b2f4c2425e9ccd102fa80a281a"><span offset-key="71be48b2f4c2425e9ccd102fa80a281a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="a6eb86dcc52d49429d92cfaf10db2c31"><span offset-key="a6eb86dcc52d49429d92cfaf10db2c31:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/keajs/kea" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9eedad3891ca4d3f9fbafb951ec1f195" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="ef5a70ca21764822aa8bde977db263a3"><strong>keajs/kea</strong></span></span></a><span key="9620d8f6293248599ea0ad64f6c6b780"><span offset-key="9620d8f6293248599ea0ad64f6c6b780:0"> An abstraction over Redux, Redux-Saga and Reselect. Provides a framework for your app’s actions, reducers, selectors and sagas. It empowers Redux, making it as simple to use as setState. It reduces boilerplate and redundancy, while retaining composability.</span></span>

<span key="2af52ba051224d85ba12e6655f00cd28"><span offset-key="2af52ba051224d85ba12e6655f00cd28:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/TheComfyChair/redux-scc" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="447faf395c7c4abcb18246d26345dcbd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="8e3fa2b517284c8cbe7be68289f33134"><strong>TheComfyChair/redux-scc</strong></span></span></a><span key="abdbdc1c18ab4eaeb52adfb12c144ed3"><span offset-key="abdbdc1c18ab4eaeb52adfb12c144ed3:0"> Takes a defined structure and uses 'behaviors' to create a set of actions, reducer responses and selectors.</span></span>

<span key="76752a40254a422da86660b287e9d7e2"><span offset-key="76752a40254a422da86660b287e9d7e2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/Bloomca/redux-tiles" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8cd1f54dbd094fc885442b96b9e064ef" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="c7b87c8d58054cb0ac8274269d19be7b"><strong>Bloomca/redux-tiles</strong></span></span></a><span key="82aa2e43cd764c2c8ac738bb36c9419b"><span offset-key="82aa2e43cd764c2c8ac738bb36c9419b:0"> Provides minimal abstraction on top of Redux, to allow easy composability, easy async requests, and sane testability.</span></span>

<span key="ce38767deb3f4705ac393ab7ac751fa9"><span offset-key="ce38767deb3f4705ac393ab7ac751fa9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/acdlite/flux-standard-action" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5c3099ce3be14071810504400f153321" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="7d7edd01acbb42bda344d1d60bc5363a"><strong>Flux Standard Action</strong></span></span></a><span key="4ace918695714b3a93be86d55da5a25e"><span offset-key="4ace918695714b3a93be86d55da5a25e:0"> A human-friendly standard for Flux action objects</span></span>

<span key="eef278153d1a410480f74bd8abaded0e"><span offset-key="eef278153d1a410480f74bd8abaded0e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/gajus/canonical-reducer-composition" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4dbdc3358f1f40f59845d15ece2cdcce" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="6ee8b6f458624e4fbfe83625b87fceb4"><strong>Canonical Reducer Composition</strong></span></span></a><span key="d441bcfbc2294708ad6ff5fae5883fe8"><span offset-key="d441bcfbc2294708ad6ff5fae5883fe8:0"> An opinionated standard for nested reducer composition</span></span>

<span key="58805d670f1e43aebe4fe89d732d2097"><span offset-key="58805d670f1e43aebe4fe89d732d2097:0">Redux is distributed with a few examples in its </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/redux/tree/master/examples" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="27e8082b780e4095bf463f121ffe43c6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="58f8f954078744afad72fd916c48748f"><span data-offset-key="58f8f954078744afad72fd916c48748f:0">source code</span></span></span></a><span key="b8329f9d875140faae133d8eed819018"><span offset-key="b8329f9d875140faae133d8eed819018:0">. Most of these examples are also on </span></span><a href="https://codesandbox.io" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="796dd5c7ed0c4f96a100aafda4619db2" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="b5974bb1c9464e3192e1520485d9a2d6"><span data-offset-key="b5974bb1c9464e3192e1520485d9a2d6:0">CodeSandbox</span></span></span></a><span key="e95a446ff5a4496bb39c3fc2b491c836"><span offset-key="e95a446ff5a4496bb39c3fc2b491c836:0">, an online editor that lets you play with the examples online.</span></span>

<span key="5d485126c99f49e68488e10cd4f97375"><span offset-key="5d485126c99f49e68488e10cd4f97375:0">This example shows important idiomatic Redux patterns that become important as your app grows. In particular, it shows how to store entities in a normalized way by their IDs, how to compose reducers on several levels, and how to define selectors alongside the reducers so the knowledge about the state shape is encapsulated. It also demonstrates logging with </span></span><a href="https://github.com/fcomb/redux-logger" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="406a5e265b5443d7a598aae97c310e29" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="f27617804b6b4cdcb0d1fd147c9c2f71"><span data-offset-key="f27617804b6b4cdcb0d1fd147c9c2f71:0">Redux Logger</span></span></span></a><span key="80daa46e5cd749dda5939c493dd62f30"><span offset-key="80daa46e5cd749dda5939c493dd62f30:0"> and conditional dispatching of actions with </span></span><a href="https://github.com/gaearon/redux-thunk" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5f3383fbcb144d58a51edd1974a00797" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="9408c221f16d4f2c90bc09ce1cd6278b"><span data-offset-key="9408c221f16d4f2c90bc09ce1cd6278b:0">Redux Thunk</span></span></span></a><span key="3380764fdf1d4d7386d57961b38fb280"><span offset-key="3380764fdf1d4d7386d57961b38fb280:0"> middleware.</span></span>

<span key="692c5da1478745b49a7624ee2cd40fe1"><span offset-key="692c5da1478745b49a7624ee2cd40fe1:0">Run the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/redux/tree/master/examples/tree-view" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6deb5ef233e947ec82be5d3f94a37de5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="b5ad4831090e4cf7a279b1ce2ea87a8b"><span data-offset-key="b5ad4831090e4cf7a279b1ce2ea87a8b:0">Tree View</span></span></span></a><span key="e7a4abf6134441f19c39e77e7616282a"><span offset-key="e7a4abf6134441f19c39e77e7616282a:0"> example:</span></span>

1

<span key="5c695d867ac04aa1b846063159e4ce0d"><span offset-key="5c695d867ac04aa1b846063159e4ce0d:0">git clone https://github.com/reduxjs/redux.git</span></span>

2

<span key="6a39414c68054eb5be70e14fb2f57bf2"><span offset-key="6a39414c68054eb5be70e14fb2f57bf2:0">cd redux/examples/tree-viewnpm installnpm start</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="acc2e39e2f1a49969e047cbabc13e1cc"><span offset-key="acc2e39e2f1a49969e047cbabc13e1cc:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="dc0c1c35ff894c5883c8cb5562174149"><span offset-key="dc0c1c35ff894c5883c8cb5562174149:0">Or check out the </span></span><a href="https://codesandbox.io/s/github/reduxjs/redux/tree/master/examples/tree-view" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="62d9d054caf9418b95a0305acddfe415" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="7580859d0838437e9c677573ebfe5bff"><span data-offset-key="7580859d0838437e9c677573ebfe5bff:0">sandbox</span></span></span></a><span key="b04233e943484d25924d0dded0a178a4"><span offset-key="b04233e943484d25924d0dded0a178a4:0">:</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-howw7u r-1vzi8xi" />

<span key="5eef2054ceb845ad86dc8bc20e2360f8"><span offset-key="5eef2054ceb845ad86dc8bc20e2360f8:0">This example demonstrates rendering a deeply nested tree view and representing its state in a normalized form so it is easy to update from reducers. Good rendering performance is achieved by the container components granularly subscribing only to the tree nodes that they render.</span></span>

<span key="6ecb0a4daa6949e797054f02c0324ae8"><span offset-key="6ecb0a4daa6949e797054f02c0324ae8:0">This example includes tests.</span></span>

## 

<span key="ee370cb9402a4cefa6f5abe8cc04a152"><span offset-key="ee370cb9402a4cefa6f5abe8cc04a152:0">Async</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/examples#async" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="66316ea5691b4d1fb07010defc2abf50" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="ee2bd288e3bd403992bb54ffb2afeb0a"><span data-offset-key="ee2bd288e3bd403992bb54ffb2afeb0a:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="c8afde1cd7654720a6f2c46e8fe3a0e5"><span offset-key="c8afde1cd7654720a6f2c46e8fe3a0e5:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="219bf3fd91e14fca9dde87d9c11e0ea8"><span offset-key="219bf3fd91e14fca9dde87d9c11e0ea8:0">Run the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/redux/tree/master/examples/async" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="99309c9c143f43bbb5d585e24ff82372" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="44387d77c90a46cf8f03a186b1281452"><span data-offset-key="44387d77c90a46cf8f03a186b1281452:0">Async</span></span></span></a><span key="76f7a8abc49d4c56a5992aba02c3f897"><span offset-key="76f7a8abc49d4c56a5992aba02c3f897:0"> example:</span></span>

1

<span key="cbd7fa22b12340b8892da7650a8e942d"><span offset-key="cbd7fa22b12340b8892da7650a8e942d:0">git clone https://github.com/reduxjs/redux.git</span></span>

2

<span key="c90e8f5d3e8649b287b37048562a372b"><span offset-key="c90e8f5d3e8649b287b37048562a372b:0">cd redux/examples/asyncnpm installnpm start</span></span>

<span key="cb1b154b69fc4c929b3c1a4e0d35de6e"><span offset-key="cb1b154b69fc4c929b3c1a4e0d35de6e:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="11aebc72772f4f9c94603744aaa52975"><span offset-key="11aebc72772f4f9c94603744aaa52975:0">Or check out the </span></span><a href="https://codesandbox.io/s/github/reduxjs/redux/tree/master/examples/async" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="622a92cc94c84888b00c519cdad4b665" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="cfaa4156c2674d9ca51b8c13beed3db5"><span data-offset-key="cfaa4156c2674d9ca51b8c13beed3db5:0">sandbox</span></span></span></a><span key="854dee6f72ae459bbaef172709f59b6a"><span offset-key="854dee6f72ae459bbaef172709f59b6a:0">:</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-howw7u r-1vzi8xi" />

<span key="c8d6538eab5448cb86a4bd935e90ef58"><span offset-key="c8d6538eab5448cb86a4bd935e90ef58:0">This example includes reading from an asynchronous API, fetching data in response to user input, showing loading indicators, caching the response, and invalidating the cache. It uses </span></span><a href="https://github.com/gaearon/redux-thunk" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="fd32cedeb9324f659524f4aee70ef3e9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="3d2dec81dc114a19a137891ee932abe7"><span data-offset-key="3d2dec81dc114a19a137891ee932abe7:0">Redux Thunk</span></span></span></a><span key="f08f8da8505c4794b7164d01e7ea3180"><span offset-key="f08f8da8505c4794b7164d01e7ea3180:0"> middleware to encapsulate asynchronous side effects.</span></span>

## 

<span key="0934ac2d52764a50b54c85537480cf4d"><span offset-key="0934ac2d52764a50b54c85537480cf4d:0">Universal</span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/examples#universal" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="05eef326ce5444e2855fbdd1b1755fc6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="b056836f38e94c10bae320dfefdc952a"><span data-offset-key="b056836f38e94c10bae320dfefdc952a:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="30ffa65b3c09439aba911b4f05236aca"><span offset-key="30ffa65b3c09439aba911b4f05236aca:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="6dda0af0ebfb4d70a5e2191a46f68f51"><span offset-key="6dda0af0ebfb4d70a5e2191a46f68f51:0">Run the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/redux/tree/master/examples/universal" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1141915992724d5f8701c65e3ba0a38e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="a8678310fdbe49678262448534cb0b3d"><span data-offset-key="a8678310fdbe49678262448534cb0b3d:0">Universal</span></span></span></a><span key="cdbcd7cdbfdd4c149e176068d9255f92"><span offset-key="cdbcd7cdbfdd4c149e176068d9255f92:0"> example:</span></span>

<span key="ef5b111ff3c94d05bd1d366851b7201d"><span offset-key="ef5b111ff3c94d05bd1d366851b7201d:0">git clone https://github.com/reduxjs/redux.git</span></span>

<span key="506687aafaf544a8a1cb59030bd4cdb6"><span offset-key="506687aafaf544a8a1cb59030bd4cdb6:0">Copy</span></span>

<span key="d04fdd5989f54d0180aa16c14e6b7e94"><span offset-key="d04fdd5989f54d0180aa16c14e6b7e94:0">This is a basic demonstration of </span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/usage/server-rendering" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="af486a7d755a4aceb48baae186fcf037" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-35575_259-35576-237__"><span data-key="d8eba83032104d7dab84b1ce83239411"><span data-offset-key="d8eba83032104d7dab84b1ce83239411:0">server rendering</span></span></span></a><span key="09ec009916fe4b06bfa1d0f2d6e20ed4"><span offset-key="09ec009916fe4b06bfa1d0f2d6e20ed4:0"> with Redux and React. It shows how to prepare the initial store state on the server, and pass it down to the client so the client store can boot up from an existing state.</span></span>

<span key="813f478555294238bccc56ef805d4110"><span offset-key="813f478555294238bccc56ef805d4110:0">This is the most advanced example. It is dense by design. It covers keeping fetched entities in a normalized cache, implementing a custom middleware for API calls, rendering partially loaded data, pagination, caching responses, displaying error messages, and routing. Additionally, it includes Redux DevTools.</span></span>
